events.name: Lady Devs Camp - Rapid Prototyping in PHP for Internet Platforms and APIs
events.about:
Developers Connect Philippines
and
Openovate Labs

proudly invites you to

Rapid Prototyping in PHP for Internet Platforms and APIs
a Lady Developer Camp Series

 

Date: Aug 11, 2012 (Saturday)
Venue: Exist TechBar (5/F Orient Square Bldg, F. Ortigas Jr. Road, Ortigas Center, Pasig City)
Time: 9:30AM - 5:00PM

Description: Workshop will teach the participant how to use the Eden PHP Library (http://eden.openovate.com/) for rapid prototyping using popular services such as Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Google g+, Google Drive, Paypal and more.

Requirements: Participants must know PHP proficiently(need not be an expert but just enough to get around).

Pre-requisites: Laptop with PHP and MySQL installed. Ideas on what application to develop for Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Google g+, Google Grive, SMTP, MySQL, and/or Paypal. Two or more platforms can also be mashed together to create a hybrid app.  This will be for the hackathon session.

Target Audience
1) Seasoned female PHP Developers.
2) At least 1-2 years experience in actual PHP development.

 

*** This is a LADY Developers Camp.  Only female, geek gals and girls will be accommodated.

Speakers:

  • Clark Galgo - Twitter, Paypal
  • Dan Molina - MySQL, SMTP
  • Erwin Seribo - Facebook, Tumblr
  • Symon Buenavista - Google Drive, Google g+
  • Christian Blanquera - Hackathon 

HURRY! Only limited slots available!

To confirm your seat and reigstration, kindly depost the registration fee to

Account Name: DEVELOPERS CONNECT (DEVCON) PHILIPPINES INC
Account Number: 2143-1770-95 (Peso Checking)
Bank: Bank of the Philippine Islands (BPI)

Write your name on the deposit slip and send a scanned or photo copy to jryap@devcon.ph.  Well revert back to you to confirm your slot.

Thank you!

Organized by http://devcon.ph/ and http://openovate.com/
events.address: 5/F Orient Square Bldg F. Ortigas Jr. Road, Ortigas Center
